title.rendered: ClinLab Staffing Makes The Boston Business Journal Fast 50 – fastest growing companies in Massachusetts again!

content.rendered:
For the 3rd year running ClinLab Staffing has made the Boston Business Journals’s Fast 50 list of the fastest growing private companies in Massachusetts. Last night our Top Biller in 2018, Caitlin McNamara, accepted the award on our behalf for ranking 37th place! We are incredibly proud of our sales and recruiting team who bring in more and more quality business all the time!

>>Check out this article to learn more about the Boston Business Journal 2019 Fast 50 honorees and how they made the cut.
